title: Google Play system updates for May bring Nearby Share to self, Google Help redesign, and more
content:
May’s Google Play system updates for Android phones add self-sharing to Nearby Share, a redesign of the Google Help app, Android 13’s photo picker, and more.

more…

The post Google Play system updates for May bring Nearby Share to self, Google Help redesign, and more appeared first on 9to5Google.
